meaningMnemonic: Remember how 運動 means "exercise?" When you <kanji>meet</kanji> with a bunch of other people to exercise it's called <vocabulary>Sports Day</vocabulary>! This is a day at schools in Japan where everybody does physical stuff together! It's fun and also very tiring!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
